segments.text: I've been told you might have a vacant room .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I have a spare room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Would it be okey to look at the room , now ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you come here in twenty minutes ? We're right in the middle of dinner .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , it has two bedrooms . That's convenient .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This apartment is nice , but I'd like to find a cheaper one .
segments.speaker: S1
